Package genshi :: Package filters

Package filters

Implementation of a number of stream filters.
Submodules
  • genshi.filters.html: Implementation of a number of stream filters.
  • genshi.filters.i18n: Directives and utilities for internationalization and localization of templates.
  • genshi.filters.transform: A filter for functional-style transformations of markup streams.

Variables
  __package__ = 'genshi.filters'
